text: (Verse 1)
Yaad hai woh din, college ki सी ढ़ि याँ ( seedhiyaan)?
Gappein hazaar, aur lakhon kahaniyaan Ek cup chai mein,
dher saari baatein Kaise guzarti thi woh lambi raatein Chhoti si pocket
mein, sapne the bade Ek doosre ke liye,
hamesha the khade (
Chorus)
Oh Yaara, sun le zaraa Tere jaisa koi nahi mila Hasi mein,
aansu mein, har ek pal mein Tu hi toh hai mera hausla
Yeh dosti ka rang, hai sabse gehra Saath tera,
jaise khushiyon ka pehra (
Verse 2)
Zindagi ki race mein, jab thak jaata hoon Teri awaaz sun ke,
sukoon paata hoon Kabhi tu daante, kabhi tu sambhaale Mere saare raaz,
dil mein tu paale Woh paagalpan aur, woh jhoothe bahane Yaad aate
hain woh, guzre zamaane (
Chorus)
Oh Yaara, sun le zaraa Tere jaisa koi nahi mila Hasi mein,
aansu mein, har ek pal mein Tu hi toh hai mera hausla
Yeh dosti ka rang, hai sabse gehra Saath tera,
jaise khushiyon ka pehra (
Bridge)
Waqt badla, sheher badle, badle hain raaste Par apni yaari ka,
wahi hai waasta Door hokar bhi, tu paas hai dil ke Adhoore
hain hum, bas tujhse mil ke ( Guitar Solo - Upbeat and Melodic) (
Chorus)
Oh Yaara, sun le zaraa!
Tere jaisa koi nahi mila!
Hasi mein, aansu mein, har ek pal mein Tu hi toh hai
mera hausla!
Yeh dosti ka rang, hai sabse gehra Saath tera,
jaise khushiyon ka pehra! (
Outro)
Hmmm hmmm… hmmm hmmm… Saath tera… jaise khushiyon ka pehra… Oh Yaara… (
Music fades with gentle guitar strumming and humming)
